content.detailedDescription: Comming from the pub, i looked up and saw an object hovering over the petrov cathedral. it was shapely ascending and descending. later, the object moved east very fast, stopping on the spot. we went home then. i looked out of the window and i could still see the object, so i started recording it on my tablet. the rest is seen on the video. the object descended in the eastern horizon. i was a little bit scared and surprised from the event.
content.summary: Elptical orb, changing colors abruptly, descending and ascending sharply. blue electrical flashes emanating from time to time

content.detailedDescription: Inside the helicopter....Enlarge pic and look between those aircrafts
content.summary: Two small spheres with outline of some sort

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were doing some night skywatching in washington county pa last night (april 1 2014). no this report is not a joke. we skywatch as often as possible as we have a lot of strange aerial activity here at night. there is an increase in the aerial phenomenon known as "fake plane/transformer ufo" sightings. whereas a bright glowing orb (usually, white, red, amber, or golden) is seen in the sky "morphing or transforming" into what appears to be a conventional aircraft light formations sometimes with fake airplane sounds accompanying it. 

last night i was filming an object i suspected of being one of these craft. my boyfriend ( who is a an honorably discharged us marine with 5 years experience in avionics) was observing the same object i was filming through his nightvision binoculars. he alerted me that there was "something" following the craft i was filming. neither of us could see this object he was speaking about with our eyes. when airplanes at the same altitude this object was are easily visible with the naked eye.

i looked through the nightvision and sure enough there was something following this unknown craft we were filming. it seemed to be slowing cruising along just above and right behind this fake plane i was filming. i began filming the incident. the spherical object had a very faint flicker to it which at the time i was filming, i didn't see. during the time i was filming it, the object seemed to slow down at times but stayed on a straight path of following this fake plane i had been filming a few minutes prior.

i am familiar with satellites and even the famous iss. neither of us believe this was a satellite. 

i don't know what this was, but im pretty sure i know what it wasn't

the footage for this report is seen in the second half of this video on youtube. /watch?V=kijzb66uzs8.

don't worry about having an investigator contact me. i know if anything is flickering it's automatically concluded to be an airplane with mufon. no offense but it's true. i just want my report published so that others go outside & skywatch. these things need to be observed & documented. they are very real. transformer decepticons are real.
content.summary: Was filming a fake plane ufo when a ufo orb was spotted following it only seen in nightvision

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my hot tub just watching the sky in the early morning,i always keep my ipod with me,i was able to capture a white light which didnt make a sound but was far away but i didnt feel like it was a satelite in orbit,it was coming from the southwest to the northeast,i was using a ipod 4th gen to take video with video zoom 2 app,the first few seconds was at regular unzoomed and then you can tell when i zoom in,but if this was a satelite,i really don't think my camera on a 4th gen ipod would pick it up that good,could it be the space station,i know this is a very late submission,but i'm hoping by giving you the video you can stabalize and maybe analyze it and tell me if its a  satelite by the date shot and where i was.I have so many other sighting i would like to tell you about this the only one i have a video and a date and time.
thankyou
steven p marlow r.T.R
content.summary: White pulsating light crossing sky

content.detailedDescription: I just went through my photos taken last year on a boat trip from kitimat to kemano and on to chief mathews bay in gardner canal, british columbia. the area is very remote and there was nobody around for dozens of miles. i was not aware of the ufo when i took this picture in september 2013. it is only now, in april 2014, that i 'discovered' the ufo in this image. you have to edit the image in a photo editor and zoom in on the object. it is definitely saucer shaped. i would appreciate an expert opinion on this. the coordinates of the sighting are 53��20"17"n 128��07'11"w. i have attached a photo of the ufo and a google earth capture of the location. i was looking upriver.
content.summary: Ufo sighting at chief mathews bay, gardner canal, near kemano, british columbia

content.detailedDescription:
In february of 1965 witness mother felt nervous and called father to go outside and saw on the west side something  on the land rise with red, blue, green and white lights
the land rise is about 1/2 mile by one mile surrounded on three sides by trees and no road to get to it
the craft had  several feet of snow on it and was not moving
it was there about one half hour and then it shot straight up above the ground and they saw the lights and it took off really fast it had no sound
my father saw it and told my mother, sister and i to get in the house
but we stayed out side and continued to watch it
we contacted the neighbors and they didn't see anything
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw something rise from behind the trees with red, white, blue and green lights

content.detailedDescription: It was jan 1st 2014 near sunset. (i always take my fuji finpix 1300 with me as we get some nice sunsets)i noticed 3 very bright lights to the west of the limerick nuclear plant and stopped to watch them. they caught my attention because they were too bright to be an aircraft.I thought it may be something out of the ordinary. never saw lights that bright in the sky before.The objects seemed to be round spheres that at first move at all and the center one seemed slightly raised above the outer ones. they were very intence bright white almost silver. by time i got my camera out of my jacket pocket the two outer lights had very quickly gone from a dead stop to where the one on the right had gone directly right and the left went directly toward the nuclear plant. at this point and time i was getting pretty excited at what i was witnessing.. i lost sight of those two and the center one remained traveling towards me. i got a picture of the remaining orb. i went to take another picture and it disappeared. i stayed and watched hopeing i might be able to see them again for about another 20 mins but did'nt see them again. the one picture i did get shows structure.
content.summary: Feeding and putting turkeys in coup for the evening and saw three orbs west of limerick nuclear plantat sunsettook pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friend house in newark n.J with seven friends in front of 7173 montclair avenue in newark n.J  and i was looking at these 3 stars when a boomerang shape craft passed over one star and covered it and thats when i noticed it.The craft looked almost invisible with some kind of smoke emiting passed over us.After that we started seeing orbs of lights flying past planes very close with no blinking lights like a plane has observed the lights going in different directions.Afters seeing the lights about half hour later.Boomerang shape craft was seen again over a building again invisible with smoke emiting passing over 810 broadway newark new jersey.I swear what i seen is true and i have 5 witnesess.Very nervous not knowing whats in our airspace.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped craft massive invisible only seen when passed by stars.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on i43 at 1250am september 20, 2013. we had been on the road for about twenty minutes heading back to colorado. i noticed an orange glow flying at about 3,000 to 5,000 feet heading ne about to cross the freeway. i told my son to look as i pulled off the side of the highway to a full stop. i then turned my headlights off and then on several times. at that moment it changed direction heading southeast on a dime. we stood and watched the object for a few seconds and it suddenly changed directions once again heading ne toward milwaukee. a few seconds later the object accelerated to an incredible speed and vanished off into the distance.
content.summary: Orange glow flying. not pulsating and no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was eleven at night i was standing at window. looking toward the south west like always to smoke a cigarette. i noticed this extremely bright object which isn't uncommon due to lvi airport near by. what really caught my attention was it looked like it was stretching long than contracting to a percentage of its size and not moving for a half hour.  a passenger jet which looked to be on route to land then swerved around at same time a much smaller faster jet looped around the object then the sky was clear except the object. i was trying to wake up my girlfriend she eventually stood up but can't see well at night. tried to take pictures but my droid camera isn't that good. i lost sight around11:30 i sat down with my girlfriend then stood back up to see if it's still there which it wasn't. i'm sure this could be verified by the radar records at airport. i'm not crazy on drugs and only had a drink which doesn't cause a half hour hallucination.
content.summary: A bright glowing light that was stationary for thirty mintutes but vertical and extended and contracted.

content.detailedDescription: I went out my front door to have a cigarette just after 4 am. i always look up at the night sky to look at the stars if its a clear night.I was facing north looking almost straight up when i noticed a white light, the brightness and size of a bright star appear and then disappear in about a second. i thought it might be a plane. about 15 seconds later it did it again in the same spot. it then dawned on me that this probably wasn't an aircraft because there was no red light and a lot of time had passed between blinks. i continued staring at the same spot and about 15 seconds later and just to the left of the original position, it appeared and blinked again. i observed for about another 3 minutes but nothing else occurred. it wasn't anything spectacular but i wondered if anyone else reported anything that evening so i decided to contact you.
content.summary: I observed a starlike white light blinking 3 times about 15 seconds apart when i went out my front door to have a cigarette.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and i just noticed the light it was coloured lights going around in one direction and was stationery,i knew what it was its not the first time it happened ,they seem to appear when i,m in pain,hearthbroken and crying,at one time all the stars were bigger and brighter than normalits like they can sensce my pain,it just flickered faster and disapeared
content.summary: They sem tu appear when im sad this is the fourth time i was visited by one with glowing white light she said she is a paladian and just wanted to say hello

content.detailedDescription: As far as i could remember, the event happened between 1981-1982. i was seating alone late at night in the fountain square right in the city center. then i heard a noise like helicopter roaring coming from the north and a huge object passed slowly before my eyes at about 1000ft over the top of buildings. as it was not too dark, i could see that it was a huge and dark object emitting lights all over the surface. at first, i was thinking why there was an helicopter flying low so late at night and i nearly shouted out loud but i could not because there was a curfew imposed by the government authorities at the time. the object did not chane its path and disapeared south.I did not run after to follow its course.
content.summary: The ufo came from the north and was flashing lights with a noise like helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I was two to four years old and a friend approached me and others during the morning break at kindergarten (i can recall some of the names but the contact is lost). our friend pointed us to the sky where a coppery oval was stationary very close to the sun. the object was at a distance from the sun that not permitted continuous surveillance but enough to allow a definite observation of the object. the object reflected the sunlight as a metallic object would in its position. the surface and thence the reflection was very shiny (see the report form for the rest of the description). 
we discussed if it was a plane as we kids, were told about and had seen planes and helicopters. these were the only objects i knew that could fly. 
i do not recall exactly the conversation and my fellows points on it but finally someone proposed to report the event to our teacher because we couldn't reach any conclusion. we all agreed. in the meanwhile we were checking the object in order to ensure what we saw and to try to get some clue of what it was. i personally discarded it was a plane because it was stationary it was different from the planes we had seen in other occasions from the yard. from our point of view the planes moved very slowly while this object wasn't. moreover, the object seemed to be closer and bigger at sight than planes.
firstly i felt confused because i was noticing something i wasn't told about before. then i felt willing to know what it was. i also acknowledged i would ask my parents about it. i also felt confident because the majority of us agreed it was different from any known flying object we were told about. 
this conversation took some minutes, from three to eight logiacally and as i recall. subsequently we went for the teacher. unfortunately during our seek nobody was checking if the object was still there and when we finally reported the event we all realized that it was gone.
content.summary: Stationary coppery oval next to the sun. witnessed by half a dozen scholars.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the army stationed in germany as a truck driver. i left frankfurt air base at approximately 0000 hrs headed to shape belgium with a load of mail. as i approached cologne i noticed what i thought to be a helicopter at first hovering over the opposite lanes of traffic. as i got closer i realized that it couldn't be a helicopter. i slowed down and stopped maybe 100yds before i got to the object. i rolled down my window and could hear nothing but the wind and my truck running. i slowly eased forward until i was almost beside and under the object, at which point a beam of light emitted from it and shined the length of my truck and trailer. i was startled and gunned the truck speeding off watching the rearview mirror to see if it was following. i could still see the object for several minutes in the mirror it had not moved. i continued for approximately 30-45 minutes and seen an identical object cross the road in front me and go out over the valley to my left. i watched as the object met with another object identical to it and turned paralleling the autobahn and keeping pace with me for several minutes. the 2 objects then disappeared flying lower into the valley where i could no longer see them. i cannot say for sure but thought i caught glimpses of an object 3 mores times until i crossed the belgian border. the objects were dark colored cylinder shaped with 3 white lights down each side. the light beam emitted from the first light on the left side of the object as i faced it. the objects seemed to move slowly but methodically. i got an sense that it was almost like they were scanning or mapping. i don't know that's just the feeling i got. when the object turned to parallel the road it didn't seem to bank like i thought it would. it just slowly turned like a train going around a bend.
content.summary: Approximte size of ch-47 chinook helicoptor

content.detailedDescription: On a sunny day me and my mother and my daughter and nephew witness 25 ufos flying very high from south east to northwest very bright light blue and white the event took place for at least 30 minutes i was so amazed i always saw things like this on the internet but never believed it until now ufos all at the same size same color and flying in formation
content.summary: This event took place over fort worth texas 3-29-14

content.detailedDescription: Let the dog outside.Saw orb in the sky..Went got my video cam objectsatrted to pluse and get bigger.I live by selridge air base and there jets whereup that night,,many strange things happen .Cam quit filming.Presons car stoped running..All this time the orb was turning and flashing, changing colors,......One of the jets came over my house very low and the orb just was gone in a sec...I called the air base that night and they-said nothing was flying..Nothing?????
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright flashing orb,changing colors.

content.detailedDescription:
I���m doing a numbered format that follows your written instructions to write my report so that, hopefully, you can better understand this rather bizarre and unusual event.  the beginning of my story is boring, but please keeps reading b/c the story will get werid, and maybe----just maybe--it can be a significant puzzle piece to the giant puzzle that you all are trying to piece together and figure out. thank you. 



1.) i was in the back alley of my house. (i have stray cats that i feed; but they hadn���t come yet. i was looking for one of the cats that was pregnant, and i was worried about her babies.)  my house isn���t far from the back alley of the house. (i���m horrible with feet estimations.)  but i���d say the back porch/yard of my house is about���for lack of the proper knowledge���about two in ground, family-sized swimming pools away from the back alley where i feed my strays. i know it was about 9pm because it had just gotten dark, and that���s what time it begins to get dark that time of year where i live. 

2.) i noticed the object because it would have been virtually impossible *not* to notice the object. 

3.) well, since the object was fairly low-flying, i knew it wasn���t a plane or balloon or other such easily-identified flying vehicles. plus, planes, etc. are not circular/orbs, nor do they glow a fiery, beautiful, bright orange color.  so i reckoned it wasn���t something that is publicly known regarding military or new private-sector experimental flight vehicles because i just can���t see them making a ���fireball��� vehicle. but what do i know?? 

so, i thought ���it��� was something unknown to (most of the) public. 

4.) okay.  so, the orb like bright orange���for lack of a better term������fire ball��� flew away. (by the way, this wasn���t the typical ���ghost��� orb. it was way bigger than those ���ghost orbs��� folks have taken pics of, yet not super large either.)  anyway, as it flew away, it dropped ���something��� out of it.  i cannot tell if it dropped out/released its object on purpose,  *or*  the dropped object ���crashed���, involuntarily into the neighbor���s tree in my back alley.  the ���dropped��� or ���fallen out��� object was either black or  dark gray. now here���s the super weird part���.

the object that either purposely dropped into the tree or accidentally crashed into the tree was robotic i assume.  i say this because it did something: let me explain.  okay, for describing purposes, , , picture a black jack in the box child���s toy for the next story portion������  this dark object was not that much bigger than a jack in the box, nor was it much different than one!!!  as i watched the black object, a smaller���again for lack of better words���strobe-like or snake-neck-like object protruded from the middle of the original small black object that fell/crashed./dropped purposely into the tree. on the top of the ���neck��� or ���snake-like neck��� there was an eye.  (not a real human eye, , , just something like a robotic eye).  and therein lies my 15 minutes: me watching the ���eye��� watching me!!!  i know it���s weird, but it is what it is. or was what it was.  

the ���eye��� scope watched me for about 15minutes until i realized that my dad would have loved to have been witness to this strange event, regardless of what it was (even if it wasn���t anything super special like a ufo or what have you; it would have been fun for my poor dad, and it was still a unique experience! but he missed it). so, upon that realization, , , i ran into the house (again, a fairly short distance, in that it probably took me about 10 seconds to run into the house������then another four to five minutes to try to explain something so weird to someone----so that they understand you enough to really want to come out and see!!!    

6.) however, and of course, my poor dad missed it.  it was just gone!  so i���m so sorry to disappoint you by not being able to tell you how/when it ���flew��� away!!!  i mean obviously it ���went��� away from between about four to five minutes----give or take 45 seconds or so���. 


(i did number 5 and 6 in reverse because it makes it easier for me to relate my ���feelings��� about it at the end of the story, verses the number five instruction you give. so here it goes���)

5.) how i felt.
well, i checked, ���affected my physiologically��� whilst filling this report because i think i  *was* affected, , , in that, , , i consider myself reasonably intelligent.  i would have thought to run and show my dad anything weird, fun, unique, exciting, etc, etc.  especially a weird, robotic moving, small object with a ���neck��� and an ���observation eye���!!!  however, i was mesmerized.  i didn���t move, sit to rest my feet, move my eyes off it, or anything for the whole 15 minutes.  i was like, ���locked-in-gaze��� with it (and it me).  like i said, i read a little; but i don���t know much at all! yet, it wouldn���t take an pro to figure out that it was observing me.  and, i hate to add this because i���m quite sure it���ll make me see ���crazy��� or an unreliable witness; but a women kind of knows when she���s been stared at or watched.  i ���felt��� it was definitely watching/observing me, and i was pretty transfixed. it was only when i snapped out of it, , , that i was able to fetch my dad (too late to see anything).  it took me 15 minutes to form my own thought (of my dad).  

i don���t know if there���s any info i might have accidentally forgotten or anyone would like or any questions. i���m very nice.  i like people, and i wouldn���t mind answering anything at all. i guess since i���m not allowed to put my personal info, you���d have to contact mufon and ask them. but i���d sure like to know if anyone���s had a smiliar experience.  you hear ���ufo��� stories over the year; but i���ve yet to hear one that a person has a close incounter with a robotic entity!  i���d sure like to talk to someone else if there���s someone out there.  too bad i can���t leave my email���  ahh well���. 

bright blessings to you all,

s 


p.S.  it was moving its ���neck���. like a snake would do to look into a hole or something. and it definitely appeared robotic (not organic entity, but who knows!!!). 
email me if you want me to email you my sketch.  sorry i didn't have a camera. i'm not a 'sky-watcher'. just was looking for my stray cats that i feed. i didn't realize the mufon form would have an upload option. i wasn't prepated! sorry! so i'll draw what i saw first thing tomorrow morning (april 2nd), and i'll have it available for you by 5pm est. if interested. peace everyone!!!
content.summary: Ufo in sky-dropped out an object that 'observed' me

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen many ufo or supposed ufo sightings on youtube and i've never seen anything like this.

my gf and i were on our way to drop me off at my apartment..On highway 97 coming ne from west kelowna to kelowna i seen a light flashing in a criss cross pattern which made no sense..I mentioned it to my gf that doesn't know anything about ufo's and her brain couldnt even comprehend what it was doing.

i'm unsure if it's criss cross pattern it was decending from a higher altitude or moving north from us as we drove but the speed was phenominal.  we have planes around here all the time.

there was never a constant light it blinked in the pattern below and moved extremely fast.

also unknown if it was huge and long and those lights were flashing on it's sides or it was smaller and just moved really fast. the flashes were a bright white.

i realize this is april 1st but no joke.  there's nothing at all i can think of humanly possible that could make what we witnessed.


 x
x
 x
x
 x
x


i'm hoping someone else may have saw it in this area so i figured i should submit this.  if course my phone was too dead to take video i tried but probably wouldnt of captured it anyhow as the night sky was still fairly light as it was just getting dark then.

i could give you exact location on google map of where we seen it and the direction if needed but it did disapear over the hills to the east of where we first seen it.
content.summary: The lights on it were in a criss cross pattern moving unhuman speeds across the sky, blinking left side right side

content.detailedDescription: I had only been in my new apartment not quite a month, and was trying to abide by the rules of not smoking in my apartment so i was sitting on my balcony, watching the sky garbage fall and the satellites. i wanted to see if i was going to see the space station being as how i had heard that it suppost to be visible from where i lived. as i was sitting there i noticed what appeared to be a jet stream trail, in my head i said never one with out two so i looked in the opposite direction. so now i was looking both east and west and the two objects appeared to be on a collision course so i really started to pay attention. i was also trying to figure who, as in which military base would be flying at that time of night. you see here on vancouver island we have 2 canadian bases and 1 american. the town i live in is kind of centred between them. nothing made any sense so i just kept on watching them. they continued until they came together and seemed to stop for only moments, then each made a sharp turn and ran a straight line side by side and then seemed to stop again and then turned back towards their start point except at an angle that made like a triangle, when they reached nearly to the line they had left when starting they again turned towards each other at a very sharp turn yet again. when they were close to their up line they again made a sharp turn only this time straight up. their stream stayed with them for only a mere second or so and then they were gone. i searched the sky for quite awhile and could find no place within my vision to see if they had come down or crashed. they were simply gone. i went out every night for several nights from about 12 till 1 to see if they would show up again, and well they never did.
content.summary: They came from e & w came together went side by made a triangle shape then came together and shot into space.

content.detailedDescription: A very close friend recently told me about this incident, that she, her husband (now deceased), and other people saw, approximately in the 1970's sometimes  -  happened on longbranch road, along onondaga lake  -  a ufo craft entered into the lake, and did not come out  -  i consider this person to be very trustworthy, and she does not really like to talk about it freely to anyone outside of family and close friends  -  i honestly do not know what to make of this incident, for i was not there
content.summary: I was not there, so checked above boxes as best as possible

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back deck of our house looking at the stars, i was facing the north northwest, then as i was looking over the trees in our neighbors yard. i saw a very bright light that was moving towards the south southeast, i had seen several planes in different parts of the sky. on the other lights i saw the blinking beacon lights flashing, on this light there were not any blinking lights that i could see, that is what kept my attention. i watched as this light moved in a straight line for about five minutes, then as this light reached a bigger brighter light it seemed to just be absorbed by the bigger light. the bigger light i thought was a planet because it did not blink or seem to move, i had a complete and unobstructed view of this area of the sky. i looked everywhere in the area to see if i could see the moving light, but there was nothing. i came in the house to get my tablet to see if i could figure out what the bigger light may be, i had a star chart app on it, the app would show what i should be seeing in that direction at that time. when i got back out less than two minutes later that bigger light also had disappeared. after i stayed out a few more minutes, nothing unusual caught my eye so i came in and told my wife about my experience. i told her i wanted to come get her so she could see, but i could not leave that spot because i had to see what it did. i have seen unusual lights moving in very strange ways a few other times in my life, but this time i wasn't driving so i wanted to watch it as long as i could.
content.summary: Very bright unblinking light

content.detailedDescription:
Newyears, set off one firework. looked around for others. west of us, about 5 miles over city of burlington, saw large orange sphere hovering as if watching. stationary for about 3 minutes since we first saw it. we knew it was not a firework toward, it was solid had own lights. 
ascended quickly westward toward water or city of anacortes. total time about 6 minutes. we were excited, amazed, wanted to see more, but it was gone with 2013
content.summary: Orange sphere with rods of diff. leng. lights on end of rods

content.detailedDescription: Chester county, pa. got out of my car looked up to see where jupiter was, then i notice three red lights in sky, in a straight line diagonal to one another fly across the sky, i knew it wasn't a plane or planes because it was low enough that i could see right through them. i knew i was looking at a ufo or multiple ufos at the time, craziest thing i've ever seen. saw it for about 10 seconds then flew out of site over my house.
content.summary: 3 red diagonal lights in a straight line flying over head, silent, transparent

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of sunday, march 30, 2014, i awoke normally at 5:58 am. i proceeded to put on my pants and shoes to go outside and retrieve my newspaper. upon walking out my front door, which faces due east, i was impressed by the sight of a brilliant venus rising in the east. as i walked down my driveway to fetch my newspaper lying by the curb, i noticed a fabulous view of the stars in the night sky unlike anything i have seen in a long time. i attributed this to the fact that a cold front moved south through the area on saturday leaving dry cool air in its wake creating an absolutely clear sky on this morning. no clouds, no distortion in the sky what-so-ever.

i bent down to pick up my paper then looked again to the night sky to admire the stars. i was looking south and saw the constellation, scorpio and slowly turned to my right, facing west and continued turning and stopped to view the big dipper as i was now facing north-west. that's when i noticed to my left, in my peripheral vision, there was movement in the sky. i turned my head to the left to focus on the object and noticed that there were no lights on this craft. no blinking lights as you would normally see on the wingtips of conventional aircraft, no white light on the nose. this got my attention because this craft was close enough to be able to see such lights easily. the craft was coming from the ssw when i noticed it and it was going to pass directly overhead. this is when i could see it's shape from how it obscured the stars in the sky behind it. it was a solid black triangle.

as the craft came closer, i could detect that it must have had a highly reflective surface because it seemed that light from ground sources were reflecting off of the bottom hull of the craft. this also provided me with more detail because i could now see the surface of the craft was also curved on the bottom up towards the sides. as it was passing over head it made a gentle change in course to move more to the north instead of the north-east.

it was now when i noticed something else that was highly unusual, this craft made absolutely no noise at all and it was close enough i would have easily heard something if this was a conventional aircraft. i heard nothing, not even a hum. i continued to watch the object until i lost sight of it in the darkness. total viewing time would not have exceeded 3 minutes.

i tried to study this object as best as i could. i had no fear of it just a great curiosity. i had a gut feeling that this was not an alien spacecraft but was man made and that i was witnessing the test flight of some new highly advanced technology. keep in mind also that my location is in close proximity to macdill afb in tampa, florida. a perfect place to hide such technology. i think this is an important consideration due to the fact sunrise was at approximately 7:30 am and this would force the landing of the craft and it's concealment before sunrise. it was also my opinion that this craft was not designed using aeronautical engineering. something else was powering this craft that had nothing to do with aero lift or drag and no visible means of thrust.

i am reporting this to you in hopes that there may have been other witnesses who have also reported to you and all together you would be able to plot a flight pattern and determine where this object came from and where it was going. or perhaps you have received reports of an identical craft at another location.
content.summary: Witnessed unlit, black, triangular aircraft pass directly overhead on an absolutely clear morning prior to sunrise.

content.detailedDescription:
Awakened at 2am sept 23, 2013 by very loud sound like a fax signal, followed by a string of sounds similar to that of morse code, only much louder, sharper, varying in tone and almost metallic sounding-very crisp and rapid and loud.  went to the screen door of my room that opens to the outside facing north, slid open sliding screen and looked out.  sound was very loud and was coming from directly overhead.  there was no light, totally dark.  could not see directly overhead because of porch roof, and was afraid to go outside.  sound suddenly stopped.  stood there wondering what has just happened.  looked to the north into the sedge meadow, nothing visible.  totally soundless--usually there are night sounds in the wetland--at least insects.  dead quiet.  then i heard the fax signal followed by the electronic sequence again, only this time farther away, out over the sedge meadow.  it is a conservation area of 475 acres and there is nothing there.  could see no object associated with the sounds.  the time lapse between the first sequence that was right over head, and the second sequence out in the wetland, was only about 10 seconds.  i listened and the signal lasted a few minutes.  then a few seconds later, i heard it again, only much fainter and farther away. then it stopped. at that point i had to attend to my dog who was upset, and went back to her on the bed

october 8, 2013--awakened at 1:57 am by the fax signal again.  ran to door and opened the sliding glass door and screen door, looked out.  sound again coming very loud from over head.  clear night, frost.  afraid to go out and look. the sequence of signals lasted until 2:04 am.  then moved a few seconds later to the north.  repeated.  moved again to the north, repeated.  this continued until no longer audible. could see no object that could be source of the signal. these events recurred into november, but coming progressively further from the east, moving north. always at or near 2 am. like something flying a grid, and signaling at intervals.
content.summary: No visual sighting; unusual sound only

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home from work heading east on rt.64 after turning off of peace rd. and coming into town. i decided to take a picture of the sunrise as it was particularly nice that morning. i noticed nothing at the time of the photo. upon reviewing it via computer, i noticed an odd coloration within the cloud area lit up by the sun. zooming in, i could see a triangle of lights. i considered that it may have been an airplane, but you can see in the photo the contrail of one to the right of the artifact. 

i know that in that direction is the approximate location of the o'hare flight corridor, but i highly doubt 3 planes would be circling outside of the landing orbit and so close together at that. i also considered that it was a smudge on the windshield as i was shooting though that. to debunk this, i took another picture at about the same time and location the next day, but the artifact did not present itself again. as it's winter, there are no bugs and birds would come up as black against the bright background.

in the first picture provided, i took the liberty adding a zoom bubble of the artifact, though nothing else had been altered with the photo. i provided the unaltered picture as well for comparison (picture 2).
content.summary: Post-picture of sunrise

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were driving from oh to pa and as we passed chippewa, we noticed 3 white lights in the shape of a triangle hovering in the sky to the right of us.   it did not move, flash or blink.  we observed it for approx 20 -25 minutes until we could no longer see it.   

it was either july or august of 2013 at approx 6-7 pm.  

i asked my mom to look to see if she saw any type of metal to see if it was an airplane tower.  she said no.
content.summary: See below  ...

content.detailedDescription:
Last evening, march 31st, 2014 at 9:38 mountain time in rio rancho, nm the strangest event happened. 

white otter (tom tetley, age 64) and i (su walker, age 55) were sitting together on the sofa watching television when suddenly a very large, potent feeling, strange wave of some sort seemed to roll silently though the living room from northwest to south east. i can only describe it as a large distortion ripple that flowed through the entire room like a tsunami. it didn't seem as tall as the room, but perhaps around 6 feet tall and rounded at its leading edge.  during the waves passing through us and the room, i remember seeing a slight distortion as if i were looking through curved glass.  it felt as if otter, i, and the sofa were being lifted up about 12 inches. i remember feeling momentarily weightless (perhaps a second or two) and set back down. it seemed like the couch was distorted upward and us with it, then returned to normal. i glanced at white otter whose eyes were also wide, startled by the weirdness that had just passed through the living room.

"did you feel that? was that an earthquake?" i asked him. never having experienced a quake, i assumed he would reply with a nod.  otter did not.

"that was no earthquake," replied the california native firmly.

"then what was that? that was the strangest thing i've ever felt!" i was very aware of the direction the wave came from and where it was on its way to as it traveled through the house. i also had the perception that its origin was not all that far away, perhaps up toward the four corners area? i picked up my cell phone to note the time. it read 9:39 pm. 

white otter just shook his head. his attention turned back to the television and suddenly he uttered aloud, "what happened to the rest of our show?!" 

i looked up then and realized the show we had been watching, which had a full 21 minutes left, was nearly ending. i checked my phone again. it read 9:54. i had just checked it the moment before. suddenly we both realized that neither of us could account for the missing 15 minutes. neither of us had any perception or memory of what had occurred during the skip in time.

as a note of honest disclosure, i do have a history of experiencing ufos and visitors from a few other pretty long distance places.  i went through my own personal flap from 1998 to 2002.  however, even with that in my background, this was super weird! i'm a professional detail psychic for goodness sakes, so my "strange meter" takes a lot to set it off to this magnitude.

so...Unique traveling distortion wave with gravitational anomalies coupled with 15 minutes of missing time by two people simultaneously between 9:39 and 9:54 mountain time in a suburb just north of albuquerque, new mexico the day before april fools, 2014.  

does somebody out there have a strange sense of humor?

;-)
content.summary: Bizarre distortion wave experienced by two persons plus missing time

content.detailedDescription:
9-11-12
i was outside at about 3:30am and before going back indoors took a last look at the sky and saw a light nearly directly east. it tracked straight across the the object or what i could see of it seemed have roughly a sharkstooth shapeand the light emmitted was a yellow/white with least three dull redish spots.One at the "tip" and two at the rear.This is where it gets harder. alot. because it was in sight so breifly it was hard to get a sense of perspetive/distance. it was at least say 600-900 ft in 
altitude, and probably 40-60ft? at it's widest and 80-110 ft in length that i want to go with. the night was crystal clear, dead quiet and windless. it made no sound. it glided by at speed at which to me was a
little slower that those small two seater prop powered private planes. i'm absolutely sure it wasn't a airplane, balloon, helicopter blimp or chinese
lantern (have seen those). after that i literally had a chill go down my spine because i really have no clue what it was.
content.summary: Glowing yellow orange craft  glided by in wee hours of morn
